mapper.sql: MONITOR_ID as monitorId, ACCESS_NUMBER as accessNumber, r.MONITOR_URL as monitorUrl, CASE STATE WHEN '01' THEN '在线' ELSE '报修' END as state, FUNCTION_TYPE as functionType, REL_VENUES_ID as relVenuesId, CREATOR as creator, CREATE_TIME as createTime, LAST_MODIFIER as lastModifier, LAST_MODIFY_TIME as lastModifyTime
mapper.insert: insert into rm_monitor_manage_info ( ACCESS_NUMBER, MONITOR_URL, STATE, FUNCTION_TYPE, REL_VENUES_ID, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, LAST_MODIFIER, LAST_MODIFY_TIME ) values( #{accessNumber}, #{monitorUrl}, #{state}, #{functionType}, #{relVenuesId}, #{creator}, #{createTime}, #{lastModifier}, #{lastModifyTime} )
mapper.update: update rm_monitor_manage_info set STATE=#{state}, FUNCTION_TYPE=#{functionType}, REL_VENUES_ID=#{relVenuesId}, LAST_MODIFIER=#{lastModifier}, LAST_MODIFY_TIME= #{lastModifyTime} where MONITOR_ID=#{monitorId}
mapper.select: SELECT monitor_url FROM rm_monitor_manage_info WHERE access_number=#{accessNumber}

SELECT MONITOR_ID as monitorId, ACCESS_NUMBER as accessNumber, FUNCTION_TYPE as functionType, REL_VENUES_ID as relVenuesId, STATE, MONITOR_URL as monitorUrl FROM rm_monitor_manage_info m WHERE 1=1
AND m.ACCESS_NUMBER =#{accessNumber}

SELECT distinct mo.MONITOR_ID as monitorId, mo.ACCESS_NUMBER as accessNumber, mo.FUNCTION_TYPE as functionType, mo.REL_VENUES_ID as relVenuesId, mo.STATE, mo.MONITOR_URL as monitorUrl from rm_task_info ta left join rm_event_info ev on ta.REL_EVENT_ID=ev.EVENT_ID left join rm_monitor_manage_info mo on ev.ACCESS_NUMBER=mo.ACCESS_NUMBER where 1=1
AND ta.PROC_INST_ID =#{procInstId}
